name: Shinigami nightshift
description:
This is the first time we join the GameJam, It's so cool XD

Game for Metroidvania Month 16 Jam.

HOW TO PLAY:

You can use arrow left right to move.

X to jump

C to Attack/Pickup

Z to Roll/Dash/Hook

T to change your power

Up to teleport when you near the Gate

Escape to quit

----------------------------------------------

Red style:

+ Slide on wall

+ Dash by "Z"

+ Wall jump

Yellow style:

+ Lighter

+ Dash on air

+ Wall jump

Blue style:

+ Hook by "Z"

+ Double jump

-----------------------------------------------

It just a demo, so we don't have sound, and Setting in game.

Some paths was disable because we have no time do make full map.

Some bugs :|

Main goal in this demo that "Defeat the Big Dog at the left of map".
